scripts.dev:win: concurrently -k -n UI,API "npm run dev" "powershell -NoProfile -Command \"cd backend; if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; .\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt 2>$null; .\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe server.py\""
scripts.dev:mac: concurrently -k -n UI,API "npm run dev" "bash -lc 'cd backend && [ -d .venv ] || python3 -m venv .venv; source .venv/bin/activate; pip install -r requirements.txt >/dev/null 2>&1; python server.py'"
